TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParallelLoopResult extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Provides completion status on the execution of a loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult.IsCompleted%2A> returns true, then the loop ran to completion, such that all iterations of the loop were executed. If <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult.IsCompleted%2A> returns false and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult.LowestBreakIteration%2A> returns null, a call to <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.Stop%2A> was used to end the loop prematurely. If <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult.IsCompleted%2A> returns false and <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopResult.LowestBreakIteration%2A> returns a non-null integral value, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.Break%2A> was used to end the loop prematurely.

Docs.threadsafe: All public members of ParallelLoopResult are thread safe and may be called from multiple threads concurrently.

Docs.summary: Gets whether the loop ran to completion, such that all iterations of the loop were executed and the loop didn't receive a request to end prematurely.
Docs.value: true if the loop ran to completion; otherwise false;

Docs.summary: Gets the index of the lowest iteration from which was called.
Docs.value: Returns an integer that represents the lowest iteration from which the Break statement was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState.Break%2A> was not employed, this property will return null.
